text: Margaret II of Avesnes (1311 â€“ 23 June 1356) was Countess of Hainaut and Countess of Holland (as Margaret I) from 1345 to 1356. She was Holy Roman Empress and Queen of Germany by marriage to Holy Roman Emperor Louis IV the Bavarian. ==Related pages== * Middle Ages * Netherlands * History of Europe * Holy Roman Empire Category:Netherlands Category:1311 births Category:1356 deaths Category:14th century Category:Counts of Holland Category:Holy Roman Empresses consort
